sophie's dream is created by making 12 sophie's gardens (part 1-4 of [sophie's universe][1]) in scheepjes whirl colour-changing yarn.  these squares are then joined and bordered using scheepjes whirlette in colourways that both compliment and calm the colours in the whirls.

the free pattern includes links to the relevant parts of sohie's universe (with photo tutorials and video tutorials), as well as hints about layout, and instructions for expanding, joining, and bordering for all four colourways.

i hope you enjoy this pattern!

dedri

ps.  this blanket was made by my friend and side-kick jenny lowman.
